texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I was recently working on a server where a user on the server was concerned with these log messages:
texts.text: I was recently working on a server where a user on the server was concerned with these log messages:

Oct 7 20:59:34 web named[13698]: client 111.222.333.444#50392: update 'domain.com/IN' denied

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The messages here are actually showing that named is doing its job well. Some user was attempting to dynamically update a DNS zone repeatedly, but named was rejecting the updates since they were not coming from a valid sources.
texts.text: The messages here are actually showing that named is doing its job well. Some user was attempting to dynamically update a DNS zone repeatedly, but named was rejecting the updates since they were not coming from a valid sources.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Zytrax.com: DNS BIND Zone Transfers and Updates
texts.text: Zytrax.com: DNS BIND Zone Transfers and Updates
